title: CopyFrom2 (Method)
text:
METHOD CopyFrom2 : DINT
Does a strcpy from the source string cbsSource into our instance at given position.
The return value is the number of characters copied (excluding the 0 character at the end.

rows.Name: rsSource
rows.Comment: The source string, where the characters will be copied from

rows:
The 1 relative offset within the source string, where the
copying to will start
